Title: Love at Second Sight
Writer: Hugo Gélin (original idea), Hugo Gélin (screenplay), Igor Gotesman (screenplay), Benjamin Parent (screenplay), Hugo Gélin (dialogue), Igor Gotesman (dialogue), Laetitia Colombani (collaboration), Hugo Gélin (adaptation), Igor Gotesman (adaptation), David Foenkinos (collaboration)
Actors: François Civil, Joséphine Japy, Benjamin Lavernhe, Camille Lellouche
Plot: A man tries that his wife fall in love with him again, after to wake up in an alternate reality where she never knew him.
